qmmm.help: Executes qmmm calculations for individual molecules and clusters

print_regions_pdb.help: print the geometry of the regions to a pdb file

max_iterations.help: max iterations for qmmm scf loop

job_file.help: name of jobfile to which jobs are written

states.help: states to write jobs for and which to parse from jobfile

regions.help: definition of regions in qmmm setup. First region can be a QM region. In each region all options can be also read from a jobfile by the keyword 'jobfile'

id.help: id of a region has to start from 0

options_dft.help: xml file with options for dft calculations

options_gwbse.help: xml file with options for gwbse calculations

statetracker.help: filter to identify excited states from some characteristic and not the energy

state.help: qmstate to calculate i.e. n or s1

segments.help: which segments to include in this region and which geometry they have

options_polar.help: xml file with options for classical polarized calculations

cutoff.help: cutoff to define segments via distance to some segment in the same region or another region

relative_to_explicit_segs.help: if distance should only be calculated to explicitly stated segments in the region or all which are also in the cutoff

geometry.help: geometry that should be used for these segments

radius.help: maximum distance to reference to be in region

region.help: region to calculate distance to. Delete if you want to calculate distance to segments in this region
